languages.text: "Она умрет не по велению чьей-то веры, но по велению Лекс Империалис. Кибелла, за убийство слуги Империума ты приговариваешься к смерти. Висирь, верши казнь".

"She must die — not because anyone's beliefs demand it, but because such is the will of the Lex Imperialis. Kibellah, for the murder of a servant of the Imperium, your sentence is death. Vizsier, carry out the execution."
languages.original_text: "Она умрет не по велению чьей-то веры, но по велению Лекс Империалис. Кибелла, за убийство слуги Империума ты приговариваешься к смерти. Висирь, верши казнь".

traits.locale_text: "She must die — not because anyone's beliefs demand it, but because such is the will of the Lex Imperialis. Kibellah, for murdering a servant of the Imperium, your sentence is death. Vizsier, carry out the execution."

"She must die — not because anyone's beliefs demand it, but because such is the will of the Lex Imperialis. Kibellah, for murdering a servant of the Imperium, your sentence is death. Vizsier, carry out the execution."

"She must die — not because anyone's beliefs demand it, but because such is the will of the Lex Imperialis. Kibellah, for the murder a servant of the Imperium, your sentence is death. Vizsier, carry out the execution."

"She must die — not because anyone's beliefs demand it, but because such is the will of the Lex Imperialis. Kibellah, for the murder a servant of the Imperium, your sentence is death. Vizsier, carry out the execution."

"She must die — not because anyone's beliefs demand it, but because such is the will of the Lex Imperialis. Kibellah, for the murder of a servant of the Imperium, your sentence is death. Vizsier, carry out the execution."

"She must die — not because anyone's beliefs demand it, but because such is the will of the Lex Imperialis. Kibellah, for the murder of a servant of the Imperium, your sentence is death. Vizsier, carry out the execution."

languages.text: "Sie muss sterben ... nicht, weil es irgendein Glaube verlangt, sondern weil es der Wille des Lex Imperia ist. Kibellah, für die Ermordung eines Dieners des Imperiums verurteile ich Euch zum Tode. Vizsier, schreitet zur Hinrichtung."
languages.original_text: "She must die — not because anyone's beliefs demand it, but because such is the will of the Lex Imperialis. Kibellah, for the murder of a servant of the Imperium, your sentence is death. Vizsier, carry out the execution."

traits.locale_text: "Sie muss sterben ... nicht, weil es irgendein Glaube verlangt, sondern weil es der Wille des Lex Imperia ist. Kibellah, für die Ermordung eines Dieners des Imperiums verurteile ich Euch zum Tode. Vizsier, schreitet zur Hinrichtung."

languages.text: « Elle doit mourir. Non pas pour satisfaire à de quelconques croyances, mais parce que telle est la volonté de la Lex Imperialis. Kibellah, je vous condamne à mort pour le meurtre d'un serviteur de l'Imperium. Vizir, procédez à son exécution. »
languages.original_text: "She must die — not because anyone's beliefs demand it, but because such is the will of the Lex Imperialis. Kibellah, for the murder of a servant of the Imperium, your sentence is death. Vizsier, carry out the execution."

traits.locale_text: « Elle doit mourir. Non pas pour satisfaire à de quelconques croyances, mais parce que telle est la volonté de la Lex Imperialis. Kibellah, je vous condamne à mort pour le meurtre d'un serviteur de l'Imperium. Vizir, procédez à son exécution. »

languages.text: «Debe morir. No porque lo exija creencia alguna, sino porque tal es el dictado de la Lex Imperialis. Kibellah, asesinar a cualquier sirviente del Imperium conlleva la muerte. Visir, ejecute la sentencia».
languages.original_text: "She must die — not because anyone's beliefs demand it, but because such is the will of the Lex Imperialis. Kibellah, for the murder of a servant of the Imperium, your sentence is death. Vizsier, carry out the execution."

traits.locale_text: «Debe morir. No porque lo exija creencia alguna, sino porque tal es el dictado de la Lex Imperialis. Kibellah, asesinar a cualquier sirviente del Imperium conlleva la muerte. Visir, ejecute la sentencia».

languages.text: 「彼女は死ぬべきだ。それは誰かの信条が要求するからではなく、それがレックス・インペリア号の意思だからだ。キベラ、帝国の従者を殺害した罪により、死刑を宣告する。ヴィジール、死刑を執行せよ」
languages.original_text: "She must die — not because anyone's beliefs demand it, but because such is the will of the Lex Imperialis. Kibellah, for the murder of a servant of the Imperium, your sentence is death. Vizsier, carry out the execution."

traits.locale_text: 「彼女は死ぬべきだ。それは誰かの信条が要求するからではなく、それがレックス・インペリア号の意思だからだ。キベラ、帝国の従者を殺害した罪により、死刑を宣告する。ヴィジール、死刑を執行せよ」

languages.text: “她非死不可，这并不是由于谁的信仰，而是因为这是帝国法律的意志。绮贝菈，你杀害了帝国的仆人，我在此判处你死刑。宿老，动手吧。”
languages.original_text: "She must die — not because anyone's beliefs demand it, but because such is the will of the Lex Imperialis. Kibellah, for the murder of a servant of the Imperium, your sentence is death. Vizsier, carry out the execution."

traits.locale_text: “她非死不可，这并不是由于谁的信仰，而是因为这是帝国法律的意志。绮贝菈，你杀害了帝国的仆人，我在此判处你死刑。宿老，动手吧。”

languages.text: "Ölmesi gerek. Birisinin inancı talep ettiği için değil, Lex İmperialis'in arzusu bu yönde olduğu için ölmeli. Kibellah, İmparatorluk'un bir hizmetkârını öldürmen neticesinde seni ölümle cezalandırıyorum. Vezir, infazı uygula."
languages.original_text: "She must die — not because anyone's beliefs demand it, but because such is the will of the Lex Imperialis. Kibellah, for the murder of a servant of the Imperium, your sentence is death. Vizsier, carry out the execution."
